[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/testing.rs] [Overall] [Error injection coverage] The file only supports injecting EndOfRunEpilogue errors - what about errors in transaction prologue, gas metering, module loading, or signature verification? Are critical error paths untested? (High)
